item.description:
Boston Chinatown Neighborhood Center, Inc.
Celebrating 40 Years

Saturday, November 7th, 2009
Reminder: It is at both Locations. See below:

Celebration begins at 38 Ash Street from 3:00 pm-4:30pm and continues at 885 Washington Street from 4:30 pm-7:00 pm



Program of Events

At 38 Ash Street

3:00 - 4:30 pm
Open Houses for Acorn, Youth Center, Adult Education, Family Child Care, Arts and Enrichment and Family Services

At 885 Washington Street

4:30 - 5:00 pm
Open Houses for Red Oak and Recreation

5:00 - 6:00 pm
BCNC Extravaganza!

Share BCNC's memory lane and our future
Performance by BCNC alumni and program participants including BCNC founders Stephanie Fan and Sandie Fenton, Cathy Cheng, David Y.S. Moy and Elaine Ng

6:00 - 7:00 pm
Hors d'oeuvres Reception

For more information or to RSVP, email info@bcnc.net or call 617-635-5129 , RSVP deadline is October 31, 2009. I'm sure however, If you RSVP later than that it is fine. I think it is more to know how much food to have at the reception.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Join BCNC's 40th Anniversary Celebration, Sat. Nov. 7th
